title: Episode 351: A Long Time C*mming (Feat. Gia Casey)
itunes:title: Episode 351: A Long Time C*mming (Feat. Gia Casey)
description:
Gia Casey joins the ladies of Lip Service this week to promote the launch of her and DJ Envy's book "Real Life, Real Love." Gia is so open and honest during this conversation about the trials and tribulations of her marriage with DJ Envy. Gia speaks on the insecurities within their relationship during its early stages when they were in high school and college together, the struggles faced when overcoming DJ Envy's infidelities, and much more. Gia even admits to why she was faking orgasms for the first 11 years of their relationship. Make sure to pick up your copy of "Real Life, Real Love," which is out now. Enjoy!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
